entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers changing to 70 percent chance of showers near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 31 March 2023
